description:
Hey! 

Welcome to RogueTurn! A Roguelike game where you take control of several characters in a Turn based Battle system like FFX and fight enemies trough a procedural path system to make each run feel different. 

If you have any ideia for this or feedback for me to improve, feel free to share on the game page! THANKS

This is just a prototype and it was made in one day. I had the ideia on my mind and had to created it soon as possible. 

The game presented above is just the battle part of the game. Its supose to be one of the first exemple battle so its supose to be easy. 

------- IDEIA --------------

This game will be a roguelike where the player starts the game by choosing one character that will have his own stats and abilities and the objective is to go trough a procedual number of battles to reach the final boss. 

After each battle the player will be able to get more character to the party and items to increase the player stats. 

My objective is to have a big number of character with diferent passives and habilities and alot of items for the player to choose to make each run a diferent one. 

What i have already in mind for characters: 

- Healer that can heal the characters

- Rogue that will have no armor but can crit

- Two hand weapon with big damage but 0 defenses. 

What i have already in mind for passives for players and enemies: 

- On death deal damage to all.

- On death heal other characters.
